tests.title: âœ… POST /api/auth/register - should register a new user
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âœ… POST /api/auth/register - should register a new user
tests.code:
const res = await request(app).post('/api/auth/register').send(userData)
expect(res.status).to.equal(201)
expect(res.body).to.have.property(
    'message',
    'User created successfully'
)
expect(res.body.user).to.have.property('email', userData.email)

tests.title: âœ… POST /api/auth/login - should login successfully
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âœ… POST /api/auth/login - should login successfully
tests.code:
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/login')
    .send({ email: userData.email, password: userData.password })
expect(res.status).to.equal(200)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body.data).to.have.property('accessToken')
expect(res.body.data).to.have.property('refreshToken')

tests.title: âŒ POST /api/auth/login - should fail with invalid password
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âŒ POST /api/auth/login - should fail with invalid password
tests.code:
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/login')
    .send({ email: userData.email, password: 'wrongpass' })
expect(res.status).to.equal(401)
expect(res.body.message).to.contain('Invalid email or password')

tests.title: âœ… POST /api/auth/refresh-token - should refresh access token
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âœ… POST /api/auth/refresh-token - should refresh access token
tests.code:
// Login dulu untuk mendapatkan refresh token baru
const loginRes = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/login')
    .send({ email: userData.email, password: userData.password })
const refreshToken = loginRes.body.data.refreshToken
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/refresh-token')
    .send({ refreshToken })
expect(res.status).to.equal(200)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body.data).to.have.property('accessToken')

tests.title: âŒ POST /api/auth/refresh-token - should fail with invalid token
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âŒ POST /api/auth/refresh-token - should fail with invalid token
tests.code:
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/refresh-token')
    .send({ refreshToken: 'invalidtoken123' })
expect(res.status).to.equal(401)
expect(res.body.message).to.contain('Invalid refresh token')

tests.title: âœ… POST /api/auth/logout - should logout successfully
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ” Auth Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âœ… POST /api/auth/logout - should logout successfully
tests.code:
// Login dulu untuk mendapatkan token baru yang fresh
const loginRes = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/login')
    .send({ email: userData.email, password: userData.password })
const accessToken = loginRes.body.data.accessToken
console.log('Access Token untuk logout:', accessToken) // Debug
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/auth/logout')
    .set('Authorization', `Bearer ${accessToken}`)
console.log('Logout response status:', res.status) // Debug
console.log('Logout response body:', res.body) // Debug
expect(res.status).to.equal(200)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('message', 'Logout successful')

tests.title: âœ… POST /api/tasks - should create a new task (ADMIN only)
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ§© Task Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) âœ… POST /api/tasks - should create a new task (ADMIN only)
tests.code:
const res = await request(app)
    .post('/api/tasks')
    .set('Authorization', `Bearer ${adminToken}`)
    .send({
        title: 'Integration Test Task',
        description: 'Task created for integration testing',
        due_date: new Date(Date.now() + 86400000),
        priority: 'HIGH',
    })
console.log('ğŸ§© CREATE TASK RESPONSE:', res.body)
expect(res.statusCode).to.equal(201)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body).to.have.property(
    'message',
    'Task created successfully'
)
// âœ… fix nested data (karena ada 3 level)
expect(res.body.data.data).to.have.property(
    'title',
    'Integration Test Task'
)
createdTask = res.body.data.data

tests.title: ğŸ“‹ GET /api/tasks - should return all tasks
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ§© Task Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) ğŸ“‹ GET /api/tasks - should return all tasks
tests.code:
const res = await request(app)
    .get('/api/tasks')
    .set('Authorization', `Bearer ${adminToken}`)
expect(res.statusCode).to.equal(200)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body.data).to.be.an('array')
expect(res.body.data.length).to.be.greaterThan(0)

tests.title: ğŸ” GET /api/tasks/:id - should return task by ID
tests.fullTitle: ğŸ§© Task Integration Tests (Mocha + Chai) ğŸ” GET /api/tasks/:id - should return task by ID
tests.code:
if (!createdTask) throw new Error('âŒ createdTask not set')
const res = await request(app)
    .get(`/api/tasks/${createdTask.id}`)
    .set('Authorization', `Bearer ${adminToken}`)
expect(res.statusCode).to.equal(200)
expect(res.body).to.have.property('success', true)
expect(res.body.data).to.have.property('id', createdTask.id)
